header.title: An award-winning, industry-defining team that builds digital experiences that aren't just beautiful.
header.subtitle: We are an award-winning, industry-defining team of strategists, creatives, designers, and technologists committed to solving challenges for brands we love. Our team builds digital experiences that aren’t just beautiful; they perform.

stats.subtitle: Recent increase in conversion rate for one of our merchants
Sicilian Nona who taught us to cook gnocchi

coreValue.title: Own it
coreValue.description: We take pride in what we put forth and hold ourselves accountable for outcomes both good and bad. We are each responsible for our words, actions, and results.

coreValue.title: Stay Curious
coreValue.description: Our team knows we don't know everything. We let our egos take a backseat to our desire for learning and advancing each day.

coreValue.title: Do the Right Thing
coreValue.description: Complacency kills. We aim for excellence and build upon each challenge with increased dedication to improving our craft.

coreValue.title: Do the Right Thing
coreValue.description: What we do when nobody is watching matters. While the right path may not be the easiest, we must act with integrity in all situations.

coreValue.title: Start with Heart
coreValue.description: Our people are at the center of everything we do. Give the support, empathy, and energy to your teammates and clients that you expect in return.

imageGallery.title: “It is a culture that makes me want to stay.”

“Ask anyone at TAG to sum up our culture, they'd say supportive.”
